text: Martin Hugh Michael O'Neill, OBE (b. 1 March 1952) is an Northern Irish football manager. He is currently the manager of Sunderland F.C., and has previously managed Celtic F.C.. and Aston Villa F.C. O'Neill was born in Kilrea, Northern Ireland. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Manchester City F.C. players Category:Northern Irish footballers Category:Northern Irish football managers Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:Republic of Ireland at UEFA Euro 2016 Category:1982 FIFA World Cup players Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players
title: Martin O'Neill
